text:
Sensor Tower | San Francisco (FiDi) (onsite with WFH option) | Full Time | https://www.keyvalues.io/sensor-tower

Sensor Tower provides key metrics for mobile app developers so that they can focus on growing their user base, downloads, and revenue (and leave the numbers to us). If you have a mobile app, think of us as being your compass

Senior Full Stack Engineer (Ruby, Rails, MongoDB, Ansible, Sidekiq, KnockoutJS): https://goo.gl/jU7iWG

Senior Data Scientist: https://goo.gl/CyisCS
